name: On The Loaf
description:
As one member of the 996 working schedule program, how would you arrange time during working hours. At such situation, Loafing might be a good choice. A little bit of loafing could really help people to relax under huge burden in nowadays.

In this game, you will play as a employee in a company that ask employee to work harder and harder. Although there is a  resting coner where you could eat some foods from the refrigerator, but the company's boss prohibit any resting in there. Try  you best to fill your satisfication bar on the top of the screen by loafing through Internet or  eat some foods without been noticed by your Boss. Be careful about the limit time.

After a day of working , you could learn a skill and buy some foods and stuffs that are healpful to you.
